EQUATORIAL.label: Equatorial
EQUATORIAL.description: Umbrella term of all equatorial frames.  Only use for old, pre-FK4 equatorial coordinates.

geo_app.label: Geocentric Apparent Positions
geo_app.description: Positions given as observed by a fictitious observer at the Earth's centre for the equator of observation.

ICRS.label: ICRS
ICRS.description: International Celestial Reference System as defined by 1998AJ....116..516M.

FK4.label: FK4
FK4.description: Positions based on the 4th Fundamental Katalog. If no equinox is defined with this frame, assume B1950.0.

FK5.label: FK5
FK5.description: Positions based on the 5th Fundamental Katalog. If no equinox is defined with this frame, assume J2000.0.  Applications not requiring extremely high precision can identify FK5 at J2000 with ICRS.

eq_FK4.label: FK4
eq_FK4.description: Old VOTable COOSYS term for FK4.

eq_FK5.label: FK5
eq_FK5.description: Old VOTable COOSYS term for FK5.

ECLIPTIC.label: Ecliptic
ECLIPTIC.description: Ecliptic coordinates; the ecliptic of J2000.0 is assumed.

ecl_FK4.label: Ecliptic (FK4)
ecl_FK4.description: Old VOTable COOSYS term ecliptic coordinates for the FK4 ecliptic (of B1950.0).

ecl_FK5.label: Ecliptic (FK5)
ecl_FK5.description: Old VOTable COOSYS term ecliptic coordinates for the FK5 ecliptic (of J2000.0).

GENERIC_GALACTIC.label: Galactic
GENERIC_GALACTIC.description: Umbrella term for Galactic coordinates.  If at all possible, use a more specific term, as historically, many different conventions have been in use.

GALACTIC_I.label: Old Galactic
GALACTIC_I.description: Old, pre-1958, Galactic coordinates.  See 1960MNRAS.121..123B for details.

GALACTIC.label: Galactic
GALACTIC.description: Galactic coordinates, modern definition: Pole at precisely FK4 B1950 192.25, 27.4, origin at approximately FK4 B1950 265.55, -28.92.  See 1960MNRAS.121..123B for details.

galactic.label: Galactic
galactic.description: Old VOTable COOSYS term for GALACTIC.

SUPER_GALACTIC.label: Supergalactic
SUPER_GALACTIC.description: Supergalactic coordinates (pole at GALACTIC 47.37, +6.32, origin at GALACTIC 137.37, 0.

supergalactic.label: Supergalactic
supergalactic.description: Old VOTable COOSYS term for SUPER_GALACTIC

AZ_EL.label: Azimuth/elevation
AZ_EL.description: Local azimuth and elevation. (Ground-based observations; Azimuth from North through East.)

BODY.label: Body Coordinates
BODY.description: Generic bodycentric coordinates. Data annotated in this way cannot be automatically combined with any other data.  Use or create more specific terms if at all possible.

UNKNOWN.label: Unknown reference frame
UNKNOWN.description: Unknown reference frame. Only to be used as a last resort or for simulations. Data annotated in this way cannot be automatically combined with any other data.

xy.label: Unknown reference frame
xy.description: Old VOTable COOSYS term for UNKNOWN

barycentric.label: ICRS/Bary
barycentric.description: Old VOTable COOSYS term indicating ICRS at BARYCENTER reference position.  In the modern VO, refpos and refframe are no longer represented together.  Do not use this any more.
